item.description:
Greater Bridgeport Symphony Pops Concert

5:30-10:00
Free outdoor Pops Concert with the Greater Bridgeport Symphony Orchestra, Matthew Savery, Guest Conductor, on Saturday, June 26, at 8 p.m. on the rolling lawn in front of the library at Fairfield University, 1073 North Benson Road, Fairfield. Program: Pops favorites for the entire family, including light classics, Broadway hits, and Soprano Ashley Harrington, the 2009 Winner of the Jenny Lind Competition. Pre-Concert Program featuring The Brian Torff Jazz Quartet at 6:30 p.m. Gates open at 5:30 p.m. No admission charge. No tickets required. Free parking with continuous shuttle buses from campus parking lots to concert site. Bring a picnic and a blanket or beach chair. No pets permitted on campus.

Call the Greater Bridgeport Symphony at (203) 576-0263 for program details and directions or online at www.bridgeportsymphony.org
http://www.briantorff...

(Rain Date: Sunday, June 27, 2010 at 8 p.m.).
item.how_to_find_us: will fly the BW scarf on a pole
item.name: Greater Bridgeport Symphony Pops Concert at Fairfield University
